SpecUpdateRate.description: This duration determines how often the application checks for updated config files

IncomingDirectory.description: A file path to the directory that will be monitored for files to process

ProcessingDirectory.description: A file path to the directory where files will be stored while they are being processed

ProcessedDirectory.description: A file path to the directory where files will be depositied after they have completed processing

OutgoingDirectory.description: A file path to the directory where output event files will be depositied when they are generated by the processing

EventThrottleRate.description: The rate that events should be processed from one reception file specified as a duration. Once an event has been processed a timer shall be set to the throttle rate and the timer shall have to expire before another event is selected for processing.

MaxEventsPerFile.description: The maximum number of events that should be processed from one reception file before the output files are generated.

ReceptionDeletionTime.description: When a file has been through reception the details of the reception processing shall be stored until this time expires.

ConcurrentReceptionLimit.description: A number that indicates the limit of concurrent reception jobs that can be executing, e.g. 1 = one active reception job

SchemaValidate.description: A flag that indicates if schema validation should be performed

SchemaValidateFrequency.description: A number that indicates indicates the frequency that schema validation should be performed e.g. every 10th file processed, when the schemaValidate flag is set to true.

FileControlWaitTime.description: The frequency that the process shall check for new files or available capacity.
